eGroups is sending emails in bad order again. This problem can be easily 
overcome by reading your posts at egroups.com/messages/nbwrpg. They're in 
order there.

::Punch/Dark One/Pyro::

Punch smiles again as Iron Raptor stopps struggling. He was enjoying this, 
the Maximal third-in-command helpless, Punch himself commanding the action.

"Punch, this one's getting troublesome."

Punch turns to Pyro as the Oblitercon complains about Tavatron's struggling. 
His smile broadens, hearing Tavatron speak.

"Don't worry, she'll live," he says in a tone clearly signifying that he 
thought himself superior, "Unless you Maximals do something stupid of course. 
Like struggling. I suggest you coopirate here, too, if you want your friend 
to live," he finishes, motioning for Pyro and Dark One to get going.

Pyro sets off once again, dragging Tavatron behind him. Dark One also sets 
off, slamming his rifle once again at Iron Raptor's head.
